00014 const ConstMap<std::string,int> MatchMethod = ConstMap<std::string,int>
00015     ("SqDiff", CV_TM_SQDIFF)
00016     ("SqDiffNormed", CV_TM_SQDIFF_NORMED)
00017     ("CCorr", CV_TM_CCORR)
00018     ("CCorrNormed", CV_TM_CCORR_NORMED)
00019     ("CCoeff", CV_TM_CCOEFF)
00020     ("CCoeffNormed", CV_TM_CCOEFF_NORMED);

00022 
00030 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00031                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00032 {
00033     // Check the number of arguments
00034     if (nrhs<2 || ((nrhs%2)!=0) || nlhs>1)
00035         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00036     
00037     // Argument vector
00038     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00039     
00040     // Option processing
00041     int method = CV_TM_SQDIFF;
00042     for (int i=2; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00043         string key = rhs[i].toString();
00044         if (key=="Method") {
00045             if (rhs[i+1].isChar())
00046                 method = MatchMethod[rhs[i+1].toString()];
00047             else
00048                 method = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00049         }
00050         else
00051             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00052     }
00053     
00054     // Process
00055     Mat image = (rhs[0].isUint8()) ? rhs[0].toMat(CV_8U) : rhs[0].toMat(CV_32F);
00056     Mat tmpl = (rhs[1].isUint8()) ? rhs[1].toMat(CV_8U) : rhs[1].toMat(CV_32F);;
00057     Mat result;
00058     matchTemplate(image,tmpl,result,method);
00059     plhs[0] = MxArray(result);
00060 }
